title: Sample Book, "Blue River Handprints Vol. 1", 1971
medium: Screen printed on vinyl and Mylar
creditline: Transfer from the Renwick Gallery, Washington D.C.
description: Ninety wallpaper samples of forty-four different patterns. Printed in color on vinyl and Mylar foils. Patterns include: Keuffel, Earth Diagonals, New Shoes, Conversations, Signal, Susy Bell, Surprise, GRRRrrr, Domus Pluras, Math, Big Sioux, Times Square, Grandma's Flower Garden, Columbus Circle, Prairie Flower, K & E, Chrysanthemums, Mosaic, Gladriel, Summer Sunday, Wilderwood, Ferns, Ripples, Wonki-Tonki, Stuart, Tabago, Raining Cats & Dogs, Lorien, L.B. Jawbreakers, Miller's Pond, Ondine, Morgan, Grid, Tar, Variations, Biafra, Chevron stitch, Tenth Street, Oconaluftee, Grass Harp, Up, Harebell, Cary and Turtle Bay. Some patterns are illustrated with a black and white photo showing the repeating pattern installed on a wall. GRRRrrr and Turtle Bay are children's wallpapers.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, "Blue River Handprints Vol. 1", 1971.
1971. Screen printed on vinyl and Mylar. Transfer from the Renwick Gallery, Washington D.C.. 1995-152-1-1/90.
